member.name: T:Sitecore.XConnect.DataPurge.CortexWorkers.DeleteContactsDistributedWorker
member.summary: Defines Cortex Processing distributed worker for data purging, that reads already filtered contacts in batches from an external data source and perform delete operation on that data.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The conditions used to check whether a contact should be deleted.
The Xdb Context to execute operations in XConnect.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The conditions used to check whether a contact should be deleted.
The Xdb Context to execute operations in XConnect.

member.name: M:Sitecore.XConnect.DataPurge.CortexWorkers.DeleteContactsDistributedWorker.ProcessBatchAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{Sitecore.XConnect.Contact},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Method invoked when worker receives a batch of type entities.
member.param: The batch of contacts to process.
Cancellation token that will indicate that request is canceled.
member.returns: object that represents state of asynchronous operation.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataPurge.CortexWorkers.Resources.InvalidConditionMessageFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot run delete contacts worker. The condition is not found: {0}.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataPurge.CortexWorkers.Resources.InvalidCutoffDaysMessageFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot register delete contacts task. Cutoff date time should not be less than {0} days. Actual value is {1} days..
